name: Sonic the Hedgehog TX (DEMO)
description:
Welcome to Sonic the Hedgehog TX! This game was created for riggy2k3's C.I. Game Jam!

In this demo, only Spring Breeze Zone is playable. Choose between Sonic or Cream, with more characters coming in the final game.

KNOWN BUGS:

  • Dropped rings may sometimes go through slopes.

CREDITS:

  • techokami for the Sonic the Hedgehog GG rips
  • paveldechevo604 for the 8-bit Cream sprites
  • Jarel Jones for the Sonic Drift 2 Options Menu remix
